name: Shovel
description:
## Shovel

A tool used to remove unwanted crops.

You can craft a shovel at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

- 1 Rusty Shovel
- 20 Wood
- 10 Iron

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/crop-farming#tools)
